trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows status bar control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle de barra de status do Windows.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> replaces the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> substitui o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle.

trans-unit.source: Special features of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> include a custom table layout, support for the form's sizing and moving grips, and support for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A> property, which allows a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> to fill available space automatically.
trans-unit.target: Recursos especiais de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> incluem um layout de tabela personalizados, o suporte para o formulário do dimensionamento e familiarizar-se de mover e suporte para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A> propriedade, que permite um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> para preencher o espaço disponível automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> in all orientations.
trans-unit.target: Os itens a seguir foram especificamente projetados para funcionar perfeitamente com ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> em todas as orientações.

trans-unit.source: They are available by default at design time for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> control:
trans-unit.target: Eles estão disponíveis por padrão em tempo de design para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controle:

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> control displays information about an object being viewed on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the object's components, or contextual information that relates to that object's operation within your application.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controle exibe informações sobre um objeto que está sendo visualizado em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, componentes do objeto ou as informações contextuais relacionadas à operação do objeto dentro de seu aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Typically, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> control consists of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> objects, each of which displays text, an icon, or both.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> consiste em controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> objetos, cada um deles exibe o texto, um ícone ou ambos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> can also contain <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> também podem conter <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> controles.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> has no panels.
trans-unit.target: O padrão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> não tem nenhum painéis.

trans-unit.source: To add panels to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, or use the [StatusStrip Items Collection Editor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c56677b-d5eb-4eca-949c-a22c4e3833a1) at design time to add, remove, or reorder items and modify properties.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar painéis de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método ou use o [StatusStrip Editor de coleção de itens](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c56677b-d5eb-4eca-949c-a22c4e3833a1) em tempo de design para adicionar, remover, ou reordenar os itens e modificar as propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Use the [StatusStrip Tasks Dialog Box](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c150678b-4873-4743-b23f-84fb3126582c) at design time to run common commands.
trans-unit.target: Use o [caixa de diálogo de tarefas StatusStrip](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c150678b-4873-4743-b23f-84fb3126582c) em tempo de design para executar comandos comuns.

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> replaces and extends the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> substitua e estenda o controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> de versões anteriores, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e uso futuro, se desejado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> with various common properties set.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> com várias propriedades comuns definido.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> supports overflow functionality.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> dá suporte à funcionalidade de estouro.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> supports overflow functionality; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> dá suporte à funcionalidade de estouro; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto de acessibilidade para o controle.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for the control.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> para o controle.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se você não chamar explicitamente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> método, ele será chamado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade é referenciada.

trans-unit.source: To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Para obter ou definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade, você deve adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assembly instalado com o .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For a code example demonstrating how to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de código demonstra como usar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The text to use for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser usado para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <c>text</c> parameter is a hyphen (-), this method creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator" />.
trans-unit.target: Se o parâmetro <c>text</c> for um hífen (-), esse método criará um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to display on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" />.

trans-unit.source: An event handler that raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> event when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador de eventos que aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> quando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> recebe um clique.

trans-unit.source: Creates a default <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> with the specified text, image, and event handler on a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel" /> padrão com o texto, a imagem e o manipulador de eventos especificados em uma nova instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.#ctor(System.String,System.Drawing.Image,System.EventHandler)" />, or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator" /> if the <paramref name="text" /> parameter is a hyphen (-).
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.#ctor(System.String,System.Drawing.Image,System.EventHandler)" /> ou um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator" /> se o parâmetro <paramref name="text" /> for um hífen (-).

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CreateDefaultItem%2A> method to add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> with commonly used characteristics to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.CreateDefaultItem%2A> método para adicionar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> com comumente usado características para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.

trans-unit.source: Gets which borders of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> are docked to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as bordas do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> encaixadas no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Bottom" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Bottom" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the spacing, in pixels, between the left, right, top, and bottom edges of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> from the edges of the form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaçamento, em pixels, entre as bordas esquerda, direita, superior e inferior do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> e as bordas do formulário.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> that represents the spacing.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> que representa o espaçamento.

trans-unit.source: The default is <c>{Left=6, Top=2, Right=0, Bottom=2}</c>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <c>{esquerda = 6, Top = 2, direito = 0, inferior = 2}</c>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.DefaultPadding%2A> property to set the interior space between controls.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.DefaultPadding%2A> propriedade para definir o espaçamento interior entre controles.

trans-unit.source: When a control is a container of items, padding represents the space from the edge of the container.
trans-unit.target: Quando um controle é um contêiner de itens, o preenchimento representa o espaço da borda do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether ToolTips are shown for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> by default.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as dicas de ferramenta são mostradas para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> por padrão.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size, in pixels, of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> when it is first created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho, em pixels, do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> quando ele é criado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Point.#ctor(System.Drawing.Size)" /> constructor representing the size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="M:System.Drawing.Point.#ctor(System.Drawing.Size)" /> construtor que representa o tamanho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo método público `Dispose()` e pelo método <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` invoca o método `Dispose(Boolean)` protegido com o parâmetro `disposing` definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> referências.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método `Dispose()` de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> cuidado para não fazer referência a objetos que têm foi descartados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <see langword="Dispose" /> e <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define quais bordas de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> são encaixadas em seu controle pai e determina como uma <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> é redimensionada com seu pai.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Bottom" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Bottom" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.Dock%2A> property to define how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.Dock%2A> propriedade para definir como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> é redimensionado automaticamente porque seu controle pai é redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: For example, setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.Dock%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Left> causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, definindo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.Dock%2A> para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Left> faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> para alinhar-se com as bordas esquerdas do controle pai e são redimensionados à medida que o controle pai for redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: Controls are docked in their Z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's Z-axis (depth).
trans-unit.target: Controles são encaixados em sua ordem Z, que é a camada visual de controles em um formulário ao longo eixo z do formulário (profundidade).

trans-unit.source: A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container.
trans-unit.target: Um controle pode ser ancorado a uma borda de seu contêiner pai, ou pode ser encaixado para todas as bordas e preencher o contêiner pai.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> with various common properties set, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.Dock%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> com várias propriedades comuns definidas, inclusive o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.Dock%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the visibility of the grip used to reposition the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a visibilidade da alça usada para reposicionar o controle.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle.Hidden" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle.Hidden" />.

trans-unit.source: Even with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A> property set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.GripStyle%2A> property set to `Visible`, the sizing grip will not be displayed unless you also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property to one of the overflow values.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A> propriedade definida como `true` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.GripStyle%2A> propriedade definida como `Visible`, a alça de dimensionamento não será exibida a menos que você defina também a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> propriedade para um dos valores de estouro.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table>, the sizing grip will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table>, não será exibida a alça de dimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> with various common properties set, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.GripStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> com várias propriedades comuns definidas, inclusive o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.GripStyle%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> lays out the items collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica como o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> dispõe a coleção de itens.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property to get or set how items are arranged on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> propriedade para obter ou definir como os itens são organizados de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> with various common properties set, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> com várias propriedades comuns definidas, inclusive o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains information about the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> to paint.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> que contém informações sobre o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> a ser pintado.

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: Colore a tela de fundo do controle.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.OnPaintBackground%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.OnPaintBackground%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.OnPaintBackground(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: Provides custom table layout for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Fornece o layout de tabela personalizado para um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.OnSpringTableLayoutCore%2A> to do custom table layouts.
trans-unit.target: Substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.OnSpringTableLayoutCore%2A> fazer layouts de tabela personalizados.

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table>.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: Resets the collection of displayed and overflow items after a layout is done.
trans-unit.target: Redefine a coleção de itens exibidos e de estouro após a conclusão de um layout.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ToolTips are shown for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as Dicas de Ferramenta serão mostradas para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if ToolTips are shown for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as Dicas de Ferramentas forem mostradas para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.ShowItemToolTips%2A> property to get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> display behavior.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.ShowItemToolTips%2A> propriedade para obter ou definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> comportamento de exibição.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> with various common properties set, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.ShowItemToolTips%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> com várias propriedades comuns definidas, inclusive o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.ShowItemToolTips%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the boundaries of the sizing handle (grip) for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os limites da alça de dimensionamento (alça) para um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the grip boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os limites da alça.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a sizing handle (grip) is displayed in the lower-right corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se uma alça de dimensionamento é exibida no canto inferior direito do controle.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a grip is displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se uma alça for exibida; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A> property to display a grip to provide an indication to the user of when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> is resizable.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A> propriedade para exibir uma alça para fornecer uma indicação para o usuário quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> é redimensionável.

trans-unit.source: Even with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A> property set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.GripStyle%2A> property set to `Visible`, the sizing grip will not be displayed unless you also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property to one of the overflow values.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A> propriedade definida como `true` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.GripStyle%2A> propriedade definida como `Visible`, a alça de dimensionamento não será exibida a menos que você defina também a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> propriedade para um dos valores de estouro.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table>, the sizing grip will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Flow> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle.Table>, não será exibida a alça de dimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> with various common properties set, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> com várias propriedades comuns definidas, inclusive o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> stretches from end to end in its container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> se estende de ponta a ponta em seu contêiner.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> stretches from end to end in its <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip" /> expande de ponta a ponta em seu <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> with various common properties set, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.Stretch%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> com várias propriedades comuns definidas, inclusive o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.Stretch%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> do Windows a ser processado.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure wraps messages that Windows sends.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> estrutura encapsula as mensagens que o Windows envia.

trans-unit.source: You can use this structure to wrap a message and assign it to the window procedure to be dispatched.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa estrutura envolver uma mensagem e atribuí-lo para o procedimento de janela deve ser distribuída.

trans-unit.source: You can also use this structure to get information about a message the system sends to your application or controls.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar essa estrutura para obter informações sobre uma mensagem de que o sistema envia para seu aplicativo ou controles.

trans-unit.source: You cannot create the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure directly.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível criar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> estrutura diretamente.

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Create%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> estrutura, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Create%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To make creating <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structures more efficient, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure uses its pool of existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structures instead of creating an instance of a new one, if possible.
trans-unit.target: Para tornar a criação <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> estruturas mais eficientes, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> estrutura usa seu pool de existentes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> estruturas em vez de criar uma instância de um novo, se possível.

trans-unit.source: However, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure is not available in the pool, a new instance of the structure is created.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> estrutura não está disponível no pool, uma nova instância da estrutura é criada.
